component.name: EpisodeListItem
component.script:
Sub Init()
m.screenshot = m.top.findNode("screenshot") m.title = m.top.findNode("title") m.overview = m.top.findNode("overview")
m.top.observeField("itemContent", "OnItemContent_Changed")
m.global.observeFieldScoped("theme", "OnThemeChanged") OnThemeChanged()
End Sub
Sub OnItemContent_Changed()
m.screenshot.uri = m.top.itemContent.fhdGridPosterUrl m.title.text = m.top.itemContent.header m.overview.text = m.top.itemContent.description
End Sub
Sub OnThemeChanged()
m.title.color = m.global.theme.textOnBackground m.overview.color = m.global.theme.textOnBackground
End Sub
